original_text:
And he said to them,
“Out of the eater came something to eat.
Out of the strong came something sweet.”
And in three days they could not solve the riddle.
korean_text: 삼손이 그들에게 이르되 먹는 자에게서 먹는 것이 나오고 강한 자에게서 단 것이 나왔느니라 하니라 그들이 사흘이 되도록 수수께끼를 풀지 못하였더라

sentences.original_text: “Out of the eater came something to eat.
Out of the strong came something sweet.”
they could not solve the riddle.
